info.name: Ziarul de Iași - flat overhaul
info.description: A clean, flat, desktop theme for this terrible looking news website. Hope it helps. Enjoy!
info.additionalInfo:
changelog:
1.1 - updated article styles
1.2 - fixed section headers

1.4 - added responsiveness and more adjustments
